text: (nabiye! ovunta) “dharmaya himi ayavaluni! oba tavratayada injilayada obage deviyange sannidhanayen obata pahala karana lada (anit) dharmayanda (ættenma) oba nokadava itu kara anugamanaya karana turu oba kisivakatat ayat keneku nova” yayi oba kiyanu. obage deviyangen obata pahala karana lada mema dharmaya ovungen vædi denekuta aparadhayada, pratiksepayada niyata vasayenma vædi kara tabanu æta. ebævin mema pratiksepa karana janatava venuven oba duk novanu (mænava)
